articles.title: Meta freezes AI hiring, even as boom continues
articles.summary: Meta halted all hiring for its artificial intelligence division, reportedly even pausing movement between teams within the company.
articles.translated_title: Meta freezes AI hiring, even as boom continues
articles.translated_summary: Meta halted all hiring for its artificial intelligence division, reportedly even pausing movement between teams within the company.

articles.title: Home Depot Hit with Lawsuit Over Allegations About Using Facial Recognition Technology
articles.summary: The lawsuit, filed in an Illinois court on Friday, Aug. 1, alleges the company uses a form of artificial intelligence called ‚Äúcomputer vision‚Äù to help mitigate theft by collecting data about customers‚Äô facial geometry in violation of the state's Biometric Information Privacy Act

articles.title: Apple Explores Using Google Gemini AI to Power Revamped Siri
articles.summary: Apple Inc. is in early discussions about using Google Gemini to power a revamped version of the Siri voice assistant, marking a key potential step toward outsourcing more of its artificial intelligence technology.
articles.translated_title: Apple Explores Using Google Gemini AI to Power Revamped Siri
articles.translated_summary: Apple Inc. is in early discussions about using Google Gemini to power a revamped version of the Siri voice assistant, marking a key potential step toward outsourcing more of its artificial intelligence technology.

articles.title: BBC AI innovator Danijela Horak Joins Epidemic Sound and More Job News
articles.summary: BBC AI innovator Danijela Horak joins Epidemic Sound as vp of artificial intelligence, Meta music's Dan Simpson boards DDEX and more music job news.

articles.title: Zoom Stock Soars as Firm Tops Estimates, Raises Outlook on AI Boom
articles.summary: Zoom Communications reported second-quarter results that topped estimates as the video conferencing software provider rode the artificial intelligence wave.

articles.title: As AI becomes part of everyday life, it brings a hidden climate cost

articles.title: As AI Becomes Part of Everyday Life, It Brings a Hidden Climate Cost
articles.summary: Marissa Loewen first started using artificial intelligence in 2014 as a project management tool. She has autism and ADHD and said it helped immensely with organizing her thoughts.

articles.title: Google Joins Anthropic, OpenAI-Launches 'Gemini for Government' AI At Less Than $0.50 Per Unit
articles.summary: Alphabet's Google (NASDAQ: GOOGL) (NASDAQ: GOOG) has announced a significant reduction in the prices of its artificial intelligence (AI) and cloud services for federal agencies.
